alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Marengo; Perry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 3:56PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Marengo, southwestern Perry and Dallas Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 356 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Putnam to near Pine Hill to near Vredenburgh. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Selma, Demopolis, Linden, Uniontown, Selmont-West Selmont, Jefferson, Thomaston, Sweet Water, Orrville, Myrtlewood, Faunsdale, Dayton, Bogue Chitto, Nanafalia, Consul, Dannelly Reservoir, Magnolia, Dallas Lake, Wayne and Memorial Stadium. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
